creditline: Lent by Janet and Gary Christenson
description: snow scene with farmhouse in background; hill on left; matted
text: Sho_tei created some ninety-five miniature prints as greeting card inserts for the publisher Shobido_ Tanaka. Although some of these prints share design similarities with larger prints by Sho_tei, the vast majority represent images specifically created in this extremely small format.
title: Farmhouse in Snow
